snippet: The founders of LXTV, a lifestyle Web site and television company, announced Wednesday that they had concluded a deal to acquire Plum TV, a specialty cable channel directed at affluent viewers.
abstract: The founders of LXTV, a lifestyle Web site and television company, announced Wednesday that they had concluded a deal to acquire Plum TV, a specialty cable channel directed at affluent viewers.

headline.main: LXTV Founders to Acquire Plum TV
